DataElement.preferredName: Tobacco Cigarette Package Label Policy Compliance Assessment Text
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The dried cured leaves of the tobacco plant, Nicotiana tabacum, used for smoking, chewing, or snuff.  Tobacco contains nicotine, a stimulant, and other biologically active ingredients having carcinogenic properties._Finely cut tobacco encased in a wrapper of thin paper and rolled for smoking._A product container with any accompanying materials or components._A brief description given for purposes of identification; an identifying or descriptive marker that is attached to an object._A plan of action adopted by an individual or social group._Voluntary cooperation of the patient in following a prescribed regimen._a free text field to specify information on the evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: The leaves of the tobacco plant, Nicotiana tabacum, dried and prepared for smoking or ingestion.

Concepts.definition: The dried cured leaves of the tobacco plant, Nicotiana tabacum, used for smoking, chewing, or snuff.  Tobacco contains nicotine, a stimulant, and other biologically active ingredients having carcinogenic properties.
